item.title: What kind of edtech professional development models work?
item.dc:creator: Dr Christina Preston
item.description:
The evidence of MirandaNet 5.0 members, assembled since the turn of the century, indicates that well-run local models run by educators with the support of companies are more effective than national programmes run by companies with the support of educators ...
